title: Barley in the Caribbean
description: Barley in the Caribbean is the first book in a new series built around a one-of-a-kind character named Barley. Barley in the Caribbean is unique in that images are all striking original photography. Barley in the Caribbean is authored by a successful Big Agency Madison Avenue creative team: Award winning copy writer, Julie Newton Cucchi with photographs/artwork by Creative Director photographer/ film-maker James Williamson. The Barley's Books series is designed to encourage five core values in children:*Self-Reliance*Creativity*Curiosity*Perseverance*IndividualityTo find out more about Barley, visit BarleysBooks.com
author: James  Williamson
